Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to a door problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
